The practice of writing outlines and the emphasis on the details of the content and form of papers are beneficial to us!But I consider that the amount of the reports and homework can be decreased.
謝謝老師這學期給我們做的各種報告，雖然每次課後都花很多時間在英文作業上，答案經過這個學期的學習後，我覺得這些時間非常的值得。因為會讓我比較敢用英文溝通，也增進了英文寫作的能力。

Because of the COVID-19, we are forced to quarantine at home and study online. While it was really an unforgettable experience. Thanks for Professor Sheridan's help, I really acquired a lot, especially the skill of writing outline.
作業再少一點：）
It can be hard to understand what we should do in the class because teacher's instruction can be too complicated to understand sometimes.
報告太多，希望多一點口語練習，而不是有種被迫講的氛圍。
